item.title: Food Poisoning Scare at Gadwal SC Hostel: 15 Students Ill, One Critical
item.description:
<![CDATA[Hyderabad: At least 15 students at an SC hostel in Gadwal fell ill on Tuesday after eating breakfast, with one student reportedly in critical condition.
The students began experiencing vomiting shortly after having breakfast at the hostel before heading to school and were quickly taken to a nearby hospital for treatment. Students allege that worms were found in the upma that was served.
The hostel warden reportedly threw out the dubious food and offered bananas and biscuits in its place after ...]]>
item.author: Dc Web Desk, About The Author

item.title: Worms in ‘upma’ for breakfast: 15 SC hostel students hospitalised in Gadwal
item.description:
<![CDATA[Worms in ‘upma’ for breakfast: 15 SC hostel students hospitalised in Gadwal
Fifteen students of an SC hostel in Jogulamba Gadwal district were hospitalised after allegedly finding worms in the upma served for breakfast. Some students reportedly fell unconscious. All were shifted to the Government Hospital, where doctors said their condition is stable.
By Telangana Today Published Date - 2 December 2025, 11:49 AM
Jogulamba Gadwal: Around fifteen students of an SC hostel were hospitalised after...]]>
item.author: Telangana Today
